mapper.select: select id from admin where id=#{id} and passwd=#{passwd}
select idx, name, seat_max, price, preview, seat_now from theater order by name
select * from theater_sit order by name
select nvl(max(idx),100) from theater where idx>100
mapper.update: update theater set idx=#{idx}, name= #{name}, seat_max= #{max}, seat_out= 0, price= #{price}, preview= #{preview} where name= #{primaryName}
update theater_sit set idx= #{idx}, seat_row= #{rows}, seat_col= #{cols}, name= #{name} where name= #{primaryName}
mapper.select: select img_url from stillcut where idx= #{idx}
select * from movie order by idx
select * from theater_sit_empty order by idx

SELECT theater_idx, start_time, movie_idx, empty_sit, m.title title, m.IMG_URL img_url, m.runtime runtime, si.screen_idx screen_idx FROM screen_info si, movie m WHERE start_time > to_date(#{startdate},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND to_date(#{enddate},'yyyy-MM-dd') > start_time and theater_idx=#{idx} AND movie_idx= m.idx order by start_time
mapper.insert: insert into screen_info values(#{theater_idx}, to_date(#{start_time},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), #{movie_idx}, #{empty_sit}, seq_screen_idx.nextval)
mapper.update: update theater set seat_now= seat_max- #{sitCount} where idx=#{idx}
UPDATE screen_info SET empty_sit= (select seat_max from theater where idx=#{idx})-#{sitCount} WHERE theater_idx=#{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT ac.userid userid, ac.idx idx, ac.title title, ac.post_date post_date, ac.content content, ac.img_url img_url, m.name, m.age, ac.admin_content admin_content, ac.admin_post_date admin_post_date FROM admin_contact ac, MEMBER m WHERE m.userid= ac.userid

SELECT ac.userid userid, ac.idx idx, ac.title title, ac.post_date post_date, ac.content content, ac.img_url img_url, m.name, m.age, ac.admin_content admin_content, ac.admin_post_date admin_post_date FROM admin_contact ac, MEMBER m WHERE m.userid= ac.userid and ac.idx= #{idx}
mapper.update: update admin_contact set admin_content= #{admin_content}, admin_post_date= sysdate where idx= #{idx}
mapper.select: select f.idx idx, f.category_idx category_idx, f.question question, f.ask ask, c.category category from faq f, faq_category c where f.category_idx= c.idx
